wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
• Queen Bed
  • Skylights
  • Claw Foot Tub with Separate Shower
  • Views to the Water Feature
  • Upper Floor

LOW SEASON
Nov 1 - Feb 8		MID SEASON
Feb 9 - May 13		HIGH SEASON
May 14 - Oct 30
$ 127$ 146$ 188

Prices are based on double occupancy and include a full gourmet breakfast.

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.
I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now.

If canceled or modified up to 7 days before date of arrival, no fee will be charged. If canceled or modified later, 100 percent of the first night will be charged. In case of no-show, the total price of the reservation will be charged.
No extra beds are available for this room type. All children under 8 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
American Express, Visa, Euro/Mastercard, Diners Club.
Free WiFi is available throughout the property.
Free parking is available on site.

item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Romance package
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: One dozen roses and six ounces of wine tasting chocolate truffles from a local chocolatier will be in your room on arrival.

item.title: Dinner & Romance Package
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: One dozen roses and six ounces of wine tasting chocolate truffles from a local chocolatier will be in your room on arrival plus a $60 gift certificate and a reservation at Honey Bistro.

item.title: Wine Country Picnic
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: A boxed lunch from the local favorite Blue Oyster Market will be available at the inn for you at 10:00 am (alternate timing can be arranged). Boxed lunches include a handcrafted sandwich of your choice, kettle chips, house made cookie and bottled water.

item.title: Fruit & Cheese Tray
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: An assortment of local cheese and seasonal fruit will be brought to your room for you when you arrive.

item.title: Winery tour
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Add a one hour afternoon tour and tasting for two at SouthBlue Wine Company and Lowland Estates Winery, located next door to the inn. We will help schedule the tour at a convenient time for you.

item.title: Breakfast
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="188" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1541586063288{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541585894622{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Enjoy locally produced ingredients from the Blackwater Ridge area" font_container="tag:h2|font_size:39px|text_align:left|color:%23424242|line_height:1.2" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1541586751158{padding-right: 100px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1541586813976{padding-top: 4px !important;}"]Our menu is inspired by local and organic foods, family recipes and fresh flavors of the seasons.  We strive to offer our guests a healthy meal to begin the day.  Please let us know any dietary requirements or special requests that you may have!  Vegan, Lactose and Gluten Free available on request.

 

Beverages, available by 7:00am:

  • Coffee - We feature certified organic Café Equitas (decaf available by request) produced locally by Longbottom Coffee Roasters
  • Tea - Organic silk bag varieties

 

Available by 7:30 am:

  • Scones, muffins or a fresh baked pastry or
  • Organic granola with yogurt
  • Fresh or dried fruits of the season

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541586674972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_media_grid gap="30" initial_loading_animation="none" grid_id="vc_gid:1549545913985-aaf770d2cfab1b9b89fc26f26b856ecb-9" include="152,142,151"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541585894622{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

For breakfast both mornings we enjoyed cappuccinos, scones and biscuits, the pancakes, eggs benedict, farmer’s plate, and the egg tartine. It was all delicious, but my stand out of the meals was the crispy potatoes—they are seriously life changing. Crunchy whole but smashed little potatoes with some kind of dry rub. I could eat them every day.

– Kate D, November 2017

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Activities
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="207" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1541593317520{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541585894622{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="Enhance your stay with curated activities for an unique experience." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:39px|text_align:left|color:%23424242|line_height:1.2" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1541593366256{padding-right: 100px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1541593739362{padding-top: 4px !important;}"]Whether you're hiking, cycling, or kayaking your way through the area, the Blackwater Ridge is one of the most beautiful places on earth.  With a host of rivers, lakes, forests, mountains, and wildlife refuges, this area will leave you in awe. For more information, read about the local wineries, restaurants, attractions and events.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541586674972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_tta_tabs shape="square" color="white" spacing="" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="Wineries" tab_id="1541593768057-7d1e0026-6e24"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541594750119{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="94" img_size="full"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1552590500029{padding-top: 28px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 28px !important;padding-left: 26px !important;background-color: #333333 !important;}"]$150 for 1-2 guests / allow 90 minutes / we accommodate groups of up to 4 Contact us to schedule a tour[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Alexana Winery & Tasting Room

Alexana Winery was born of Dr. Madaiah Revana’s love of the great wines of Burgundy. In the spring of 2005, Dr. Revana began a search for both the ideal region and an experienced winemaker with the goal of producing Pinot Noirs that could rival those from Burgundy. His search ended in Oregon’s Willamette Valley, where he met Lynn Penner-Ash. Alexana is named after Dr. Revana’s daughter, Alexandra.

Belle Pente Vineyard & Winery

Belle Pente (bell-pont') means "beautiful slope" - a perfect description for our hillside vineyard site in the Yamhill-Carlton District of Oregon's Willamette Valley. Our inspiration comes from the exquisite wines of Burgundy and Alsace, and follows the guiding principle that great wine is made in the vineyard and merely nurtured in the winery. Our standard practices include organic & biodynamic viticulture, carefully managing vineyard quality and yields, and meticulously hand sorting the grapes that arrive at the winery to remove all underripe or damaged fruit. Our 3-level, gravity-flow winery is designed for gentle, natural winemaking in small lots, with minimal handling and manipulation, to produce premium wines of character and distinction.

Carlton Cellars

Welcome to Carlton Cellars. We're an artisanal Winery, Vineyard & Tasting Room in the heart of Oregon wine country, passionate about making premium Pinot Noir and other fine wines in the Willamette Valley handcraft tradition.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Dining" tab_id="1541595016069-9dd95067-ff40"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541594750119{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="93" img_size="full"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1552590574132{padding-top: 28px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 28px !important;padding-left: 26px !important;background-color: #333333 !important;}"]$65 per guest / allow 60 minutes / seatings up to 8 Contact us to schedule a tasting session[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Cuvée

Cuvée is located in the historic downtown Carlton, experience a carefully-crafted country French cuisine with hand-selected meats, seafood and vegetables sourced from local farms and vendors. A wine list of local favorites and French imports, along with a classic cocktail menu, rounded out the offerings for a classic and tastefully casual dining experience.

The Horse Radish

The Horse Radish offers the ultimate wine country experience to visitors and locals alike! We have amazing artisan cheeses, meats, and a wonderful lunch menu. You can enjoy our seasonal offerings here or to go for the perfect picnic. We have 50+ hand-selected Northwest wines, with a dozen open daily for tasting, with selections changing each Friday. They also offer live music every Friday and Saturday from 7-10 p.m. with a special dinner option offered in addition to their regular menu.

Golden Valley Brewery and Restaurant

Best Brew Pub in the Heart of Wine Country! Since we started in 1993, we've followed a fresh, local, made-in-house cuisine program at Golden Valley.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Fun things to do" tab_id="1541595289492-ce1a3de3-3a3c"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541594750119{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="94" img_size="full"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1552590590200{padding-top: 28px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 28px !important;padding-left: 26px !important;background-color: #333333 !important;}"]$150 for 1-2 guests / allow 90 minutes / we accommodate groups of up to 4 Contact us to schedule an activity[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Equestrian Wine Tours

Our well trained gaited Tennessee Walking Horses offer a comfortable ride through the famous Red Hills of Dundee, well known for their excellent wine, especially Pinot Noir. No experience is necessary, only a comfort zone being around horses, a sense of adventure and a desire for a good time! We also invite you to join us for our timeless carriage rides in the countryside. Our tours enhance and bring enjoyment to weddings, engagement parties, anniversaries and other special occasions you may be planning! Gourmet picnics, custom tours and special requests are welcome.

International Pinot Noir Celebration

Along with the winemakers, speakers and chefs, it is the relaxing and festive atmosphere that sets the IPNC apart from all other wine events. Whether tasting Grand Cru Burgundy or walking through Oregon vineyards with the grower who planted them, guests find themselves unwinding in picturesque Oregon wine country for what Eric Asimov, wine writer for the New York Times, describes as “one of those rare wine gatherings that works on every level.”

Lafayette School House Antique

The three story vintage 1912 Schoolhouse found a new life as Oregon's largest permanent antique display. It is filled with the wares of over 100 antique dealers. The adjacent gymnasium displays antique oak, pine and mahogany furniture.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Useful links" tab_id="1541595382521-4a0cc141-f40e"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1541594750119{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 15px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_single_image image="92" img_size="full"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1552590605428{padding-top: 28px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 28px !important;padding-left: 26px !important;background-color: #333333 !important;}"]From $127 for 1-2 guests / price per night / special rates available Contact us for inquiries[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

Tommy's Bicycle Shop

Tommy’s Bicycle Shop is the center of Yamhill County’s cycling universe. Ask anyone you know and they will say “I bought my first bike at Tommy’s.” If they tell you otherwise, don’t trust them.

Blackwater Wine Board

All wines come from someplace, but the best wines can only come from an extraordinary place. Blackwater is a world-class wine region with 18 approved winegrowing regions, more than 600 wineries and more than 900 vineyards producing 72 varieties of grapes. Come visit to see and taste for yourself what the wine writers and restaurateurs are rhapsodizing about. Blackwater 's vintners are waiting.

Travel Blackwater

Blackwater’s got hot high desert country to the east, balmy coast to the west, and mountains, rivers and forests in between. Not to mention many great towns on your must-see list. You’ve got a lot of ground to cover, and we are here to help you figure out how to get around.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541585894622{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
So romantic! I celebrated my honeymoon here this past weekend. It’s such a beautiful place and the service was impeccable. I highly recommend it. – Kate D, November 2017
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Rooms
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="231" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1541601466683{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541585894622{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_custom_heading text="The Blackwater ridge reflects the charm and ambiance of our fine wine country location." font_container="tag:h2|font_size:39px|text_align:left|color:%23424242|line_height:1.2" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1541601272964{padding-right: 100px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1541602127021{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 4px !important;}"]All our rooms are tastefully appointed and feature queen sized beds and private bathroom. Toiletries and hair dryers are provided. Some rooms have tub with shower and others have shower only. Rooms on the back side of the house have a fireplace and vineyard views. Those on the front of the house have three windows and hillside view. The inn has central air conditioning. A two course gourmet breakfast is included with your room rate. Coffee and tea are available all day.

  • Check in is between 2 p.m. and 6 p.m. Special arrangements can be made for late arrivals. Check-out is at 10 a.m.
  • Children 12 years and older are welcome. However, our rooms are double occupancy only and cannot accommodate extra beds or people.
  • No smoking is allowed on the property.
  • Pets are not allowed, but we can assist you in finding local lodging for your pet.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541602095309{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][byt_widget_accommodation_list title="" number_of_posts="3" sort_by="title" sort_descending="" show_featured_only="" display_mode="card" posts_per_row="3" show_fields="title,image,actions,description,address,stars,rating,price" accommodation_tag_ids="" accommodation_type_ids="" css=""][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1541602165987{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6" css=".vc_custom_1541585696972{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]

I’d like to write a negative review so we could keep it to ourselves, but I just can’t. If you want an incredible experience, especially if you’re in it for the wine, it’s the perfect home base. It is an absolute gem! But don’t tell anyone.

– Jason D, December 2017

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
